item.title: Process Injection using DInvoke
item.description: Introduction Back in June, I posted a short update on my shared blog regarding the SharpSploit v1.6 release. Within that post I mentioned Dynamic Invocation, which is a new feature introduced by TheWover and b33f. It wasn’t the focus of my post so I didn’t go into any details, but TheWover already published some information about what DInvoke is and how to use it. I obviously won’t reiterate everything written there, but here’s a quick recap:
